author: mtosi
body:
create 2 packages:
- DQM/TrackingMonitorSource
- DQM/TrackingMonitorClient
  and add the corresponding modules in the main DQM sequences (both source and certification)
  [of course the DQM/SiStripMonitorClient has been updated correspondingly]
  WARNING: cosmic configuration is still not changed

moreover, the selection of tracks to be monitored is no more hard coded,
the use of the TrackSelector has been introduced
=> a different directory structure has been defined (no more "GoodTrack" sub-directory)
and all available plots are now in the "generalTracks" and "highPurity/pt_1" directories

the tracking certification is now using also the NumberOfSeed histograms

the Alignment requested few new plots which are useful for monitoring and validating possible issue related to the tracker alignment (movement of the pixel detector, for instance)
the DQMOffline/RecoB/plugins/PrimaryVertexMonitor.cc has been updated and also the getByToken has been developed in this module
title: tracking DQM independent from sistrip one
